title: Hottest Deals in Tech Push Crunchbase Unicorn Board Toward $7T in Value
title_zh: 科技界最热交易推动 Crunchbase 独角兽榜单估值逼近 7 万亿美元
author: Gené Teare
summary: Three years into the AI boom, the Crunchbase Unicorn Board is approaching $7 trillion in collective value. The board added $1.6 trillion in 2025, the second-largest annual spike on record. OpenAI leads at $500 billion, followed by ByteDance at $480 billion and SpaceX at $400 billion.
summary_zh: 进入人工智能热潮第三年，Crunchbase 独角兽榜单的集体估值正逼近 7 万亿美元。2025 年榜单新增 1.6 万亿美元，为有纪录以来第二大年度增幅。OpenAI 以 5000 亿美元居首，其次为字节跳动的 4800 亿美元和 SpaceX 的 4000 亿美元。

paragraphs.en: Three years into the AI boom, the Crunchbase Unicorn Board is approaching $7 trillion in collective value for the first time amid an unprecedented rise in valuations for the hottest private companies. A total of $1.6 trillion of value was added to the board this year, which lists the most highly valued, private, venture-backed startups in the world. That increase marks the second-largest valuation boost in a year, following only 2021.
paragraphs.zh: 进入 AI 热潮第三年，Crunchbase 独角兽榜单的集体估值首次逼近 7 万亿美元，最热门私人公司的估值正以前所未有的速度攀升。今年榜单共新增 1.6 万亿美元估值。该榜单收录全球估值最高、由风险投资支持的私营初创企业。这一增幅为有纪录以来第二大年度估值跃升，仅次于 2021 年。

notes.explain: 进入……第三年；into 表示进入某一阶段
估值提升；boost 表示推动、增强

paragraphs.en: OpenAI is the most highly valued private company at $500 billion, followed by TikTok owner ByteDance valued at $480 billion. Up next is SpaceX at $400 billion, and Anthropic at $183 billion. All four of these companies were valued in the second half of 2025, with the leading three via secondary sales to provide liquidity to employees or investors.
paragraphs.zh: OpenAI 以 5000 亿美元成为估值最高的私营公司，TikTok 母公司字节跳动以 4800 亿美元位列第二。SpaceX 以 4000 亿美元紧随其后，Anthropic 为 1830 亿美元。这四家公司的估值均在 2025 年下半年完成，前三名通过二次出售为员工或投资人提供流动性。

notes.explain: 二次出售；指将已持有的股份转售给其他投资者，而非公司首次融资
提供流动性；liquidity 指将资产变现的能力

paragraphs.en: Those deals triggered a major reshuffling at the top of the board this year. A year ago, the highest-valued unicorn was ByteDance at $220 billion, followed by OpenAI at $157 billion. Newcomers to the top 10 this year include Anthropic, now the fourth-most valuable, and fintech decacorn Revolut with a valuation of $75 billion placing it in the No. 9 spot.
paragraphs.zh: 这些交易今年引发榜单顶端的大幅洗牌。一年前，估值最高的独角兽是 2200 亿美元的字节跳动，其次是 1570 亿美元的 OpenAI。今年跻身前十的新面孔包括现已位列第四的 Anthropic，以及估值 750 亿美元的金融科技十角兽 Revolut，位居第九。

notes.explain: 引发重新洗牌；reshuffle 原指重新洗牌，比喻排名或结构变化
十角兽；估值达到 100 亿美元以上的初创企业

paragraphs.en: At the end of 2024, there were 70 startups on the board valued at $10 billion or more. There are now 82 such decacorns, 24 of which joined this year. Five decacorn startups also exited the board this year via IPOs or acquisitions, six companies were downgraded in value below $10 billion, and one merged with another decacorn.
paragraphs.zh: 截至 2024 年底，榜上有 70 家估值在 100 亿美元及以上的初创企业。如今这类十角兽已达 82 家，其中 24 家今年新进。今年还有 5 家十角兽通过 IPO 或并购退出榜单，6 家估值被下调至 100 亿美元以下，另有 1 家与另一家十角兽合并。

notes.explain: 退出榜单；exit 在此指不再符合上榜条件而离开
估值被下调；downgrade 表示降低等级或估值

paragraphs.en: The valuation increases seen this year and in 2021 are massive compared to most years. Even last year, as AI investment surged, the board added around $400 billion by year end. In 2023, around $100 billion was added for still-private companies on the board. Of the 36 private companies that achieved the largest valuations in 2025, 40% reached decacorn-plus valuations in less than five years from founding.
paragraphs.zh: 今年和 2021 年的估值增幅相比多数年份都极为惊人。即便去年 AI 投资激增，榜单到年底也只增加了约 4000 亿美元。2023 年，仍为私营企业的上榜公司合计增加约 1000 亿美元。在 2025 年估值提升最大的 36 家私营公司中，40% 在成立不到五年内就达到十角兽及以上估值。

notes.explain: 十角兽及以上；plus 表示超过、以上
自成立以来；founding 指公司创立

paragraphs.en: New unicorn counts and exits were also up this year, back to pre-pandemic levels, after a slower few years in 2024 and 2023. Much of the valuation increase came from secondary sales in the second half of 2025, providing liquidity to employees and investors of the top companies. The AI wave continues to drive rapid valuation increases for the hottest private tech companies.
paragraphs.zh: 今年新晋独角兽数量和退出事件也均有回升，恢复到疫情前水平，而 2023 和 2024 年曾较为低迷。估值增长很大一部分来自 2025 年下半年的二次出售，为头部公司的员工和投资者提供了流动性。AI 浪潮仍在推动最热门私营科技公司的估值快速攀升。

notes.explain: 恢复到疫情前水平；pre-pandemic 指疫情爆发之前
AI 浪潮；wave 比喻某一趋势或运动的高潮

vocabulary.meaning: 独角兽（估值达10亿美元的初创企业）
vocabulary.example: The Crunchbase Unicorn Board lists the most highly valued private startups.
A total of $1.6 trillion of value was added to the board this year.
Secondary sales provide liquidity to employees or investors.

vocabulary.meaning: 十角兽（估值达100亿美元的初创企业）
vocabulary.example: Revolut is a fintech decacorn with a valuation of $75 billion.
Five decacorn startups exited the board this year via IPOs or acquisitions.
Those deals triggered a major reshuffling at the top of the board.

discussion_questions.en: What factors have driven the unprecedented rise in unicorn valuations in 2025?
discussion_questions.zh: 哪些因素推动了 2025 年独角兽估值的空前增长？

discussion_questions.en: How do secondary sales benefit both employees and investors of high-growth startups?
discussion_questions.zh: 二次出售如何同时惠及高增长初创企业的员工和投资者？

discussion_questions.en: Should we be concerned about the concentration of value in a few AI companies? Why or why not?
discussion_questions.zh: 我们是否应担心价值集中少数 AI 公司？为什么？
